Package sheep.game

Contains classes related to game logic.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SpriteContainer An interface for classes which contains Sprites.
 

Class Summary
Camera Can be attached to a World object and translate the entire scene according its position.
Game This class is subclass of SurfaceView, which makes it "viewable" in an Android application.
GameThread The GameThread contains all the States and is the main loop the game.
Layer Abstract class for all Layers.
Sprite The Sprite represents superclass of the "models" of the game objects.
State You should inherit from this class to create the various states for your game.
World A World is a simply a collection of Layers and a Camera.
 

Package sheep.game Description

Contains classes related to game logic.
